definition: to burn/to ignite/to light/fig. to spark off (hopes)/to start (debate)/to raise (hopes)

sentences.english: The experimental results show that knock is caused by end gas autoignition.
sentences.chinese: 自燃通常会，但并不总是引起爆震。

sentences.english: Don’t wait for spontaneous combustion or for someone to set light to you.
sentences.chinese: 不要等待自燃，或别人为你提供火种。

sentences.english: The analysis and investigation of this self-burning phenomenon have been discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文对此自燃现象进行了分析探讨。

sentences.english: The spontaneous combustion of coal seam endangers the safe production.
sentences.chinese: 井下煤层自燃严重危害着安全生产。

sentences.english: Such coal autoignition is a big hidden trouble to the coal storage.
sentences.chinese: 煤炭自燃火灾严重影响煤炭的安全生产和储藏。

sentences.english: Burning waste heap is one of the major air pollution sources in. coalmine areas.
sentences.chinese: 煤矿自燃矸石山是矿区一大污染源。

sentences.english: Higher-octane gasolines prevent this sort of early combustion.
sentences.chinese: 高辛烷值汽油是一类不容易自燃的燃料。

sentences.english: Improves the spontaneous auto-ignition point of diesel fuel, which shortens ignition lag time.
sentences.chinese: 改善自发自燃点的柴油燃料，点火延迟时间缩短。

sentences.english: Burning waste heap is one of the major air pollution sources in.
sentences.chinese: 煤矿自燃矸石山是矿区一大污染源。

sentences.english: Spontaneous combustion ignited the heap of oil-soaked rags in the basement.
sentences.chinese: 自燃使得地下室渍油的破布堆燃烧起来了。

sentences.english: A stack of hay will self-ignite if it stays for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 干草堆放久了就会自燃。

sentences.english: The selfignition hazard in ammunition is simulated numerically.
sentences.chinese: 对发射药热自燃现象进行了数值模拟研究。

sentences.english: To aim at its self-ignition accident in overhaul, control countermeasure were brought forwards.
sentences.chinese: 针对检修过程中硫化亚铁自燃事故提出了控制对策。

sentences.english: The determination of limit parameters of coal spontaneous combustion is the foundation of prediction technology of coal-seam spontaneous combustion.
sentences.chinese: 煤自燃极限参数的确定是煤层自燃预测技术的基础。

sentences.english: The determination of limit parameters of coal spontaneous combustion is the foundation of prediction technology of coal-seam spontaneous combustion.
sentences.chinese: 煤自燃极限参数的确定是煤层自燃预测技术的基础。

sentences.english: Heat gathering was the key factors for iron sulfide self-ignite.
sentences.chinese: 热量积聚在硫化铁自燃进程中起着关键性的作用。

definition: to catch fire/to cook/to get angry
to tailgate/to hit the car in front as a result of tailgating
to discharge smoke/to fume with rage
oil spill/oil leak/(fig.) boo! (opposite of 加油[jia1 you2])
